name: callback response
database collection information
info:
The collection is named LicensePlate. 
Each document format is :
```JavaScript
{
    "_id": ObjectID("585a4732ac11400192a60b85"),
    "last": "Kowalski",
    "first": "Jan",
    "Title": "Zabawa",
    "hour": "13",
    "minute": "30"
}
```

{ title:"Last name", name: "last", type: "text", width: 50 },
{ title:"First name", name: "first", type: "text", width: 50 },
{ title:"Title", name: "Title", type: "text", width: 50 },
{ title:"Hour", name: "hour", type:"number", width: 25},
{ title:"Minute", align:"left",  name: "minute", type:"number" , width: 25},
{ type: "control" }

name: moving
loading
func:
state="loading"
speed = 0
temperature = Math.floor(temperature* 0.3)
var vload = Math.floor(Math.random() * (50 - 5)) + 5
msg.payload.properties.load = vload
load = vload
timestamp = Date.now()
msg.delay = global.get("loadingTime")
return msg;

name: unloading
func:
state="unloading"
speed = 0
temperature = Math.floor(temperature * 0.3)
msg.payload.properties.load = 0
load = 0

timestamp = Date.now()
msg.delay = global.get("unloadingTime")
return msg;
